actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration, S. Rept. 95-437.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: Resolution authorizing supplemental expenditures by the Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs for inquiries and investigations.

summary.text: Amends Senate Resolution 164, 95th Congress, by authorizing the Senate Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs to make expenditures, not to exceed $670,000, from the contingent fund of the Senate, for hearings and investigations.

titles.title: Resolution authorizing supplemental expenditures by the Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs for inquiries and investigations.
